actions.name: Shadow Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 9 (1d8+5) slashing damage + 10 (3d6) necrotic.

actions.name: Stride of Damnation (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Moves up to its speed through its enemies. This move doesn't provoke opportunity attacks. Each creature through which templar passes: 35 (10d6) cold (DC 16 Dex half damage). It can't use this while mounted.

bonus_actions.name: Ghostly Mount
bonus_actions.desc: Can summon or dismiss a ghostly mount mounting or dismounting it as part of this bonus action with o spending movement. Mount uses the stats of a warhorse skeleton except it has the Incorporeal Movement trait a flying speed of 60 feet 40 hp and resistance to cold and necrotic and B/P/S damage from nonmagical attacks. If mount is slain it disappears leaving behind no physical form and templar must wait 1 hr before summoning it again.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If mounted and it moves 20'+ straight to foe and hits with shadow blade on same turn target takes an extra 10 (3d6) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement
special_abilities.desc: Move through others/objects as difficult terrain. Takes 5 (1d10) force if it ends turn in object.

special_abilities.name: Turning Defiance
special_abilities.desc: It and all ghouls within 30' of it: advantage on saves vs. turn undead.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.
